description: This package converts supplied audio files to Markdown, based on a limited set of in-audio prompts.
author: Steamship

steamshipRegistry.tagline: Turn audio files into formatted markdown for your blog or note taking app.
steamshipRegistry.tagline2: A simple structured language lets you add headings, bulleted lists, and numbered lists.
steamshipRegistry.usefulFor: Useful for developers and plugin authors building audio integrations into their apps.
